thing-type.label: State Machine
thing-type.description: A State Machine representing an appliance, which will monitor and measure power and energy

parameter.name: name
parameter.label: Name
parameter.description: Name of appliance, for instance washingmachine, dishwasher, dryingcabinet etc, must be unique

parameter.name: activeThreshold
parameter.label: Active Threshold
parameter.description: Threshold for when the appliance is considered to be transitioned to state active

parameter.name: idleTime
parameter.label: Idle Time
parameter.description: Time in seconds for the appliance to be idling, if this it's idling more than this time it will be considered to be finished or not active.

parameter.name: cost
parameter.label: Cost
parameter.description: Cost for 1 kWh in the selected currency

parameter.name: timerDelay
parameter.label: Timer Delay
parameter.description: Delay for timer updating state if no power value is present

parameter.name: dateFormat
parameter.label: Date Format
parameter.description: Date and time format used for started / completed

channel-type.description: Power input to the state machine

channel-type.description: Energy input to the state machine
